column39: /* 0 is not an option; 1 is option; 2 is given + option; 3 is choice (pick one) + option */

column3: You lead by shielding allies with your prayers, healing, and using powers that improve your allies' attacks.
column5: You have been invested with the authority to wield divine power on behalf of a deity, faith, or philosophy.

column3: You are very tough and have the exceptional ability to contain enemies in melee.
column5: You have become a master of combat through endless hours of practice, determination, and your own sheer physical toughness.

column3: You are extremely durable, with high hit points and the ability to wear the heaviest armor. You can issue bold challenges to foes and compel them to fight you rather than your allies.
column5: You are a divine warrior, a crusader and protector of your faith.

column3: You concentrate on either ranged attacks or two-weapon melee fighting to deal a lot of damage to one enemy at a time. Your attacks rely on speed and mobility, since you prefer to use hit-and- run tactics whenever possible.
column5: Your talents depend on exten- sive training and practice, inner confidence, and natural proficiency.

column3: You dart in to attack, do massive damage, and then retreat to safety. You do best when teamed with a defender to flank enemies.
column5: Your talents depend on extensive training and constant practice, innate skill, and natural coordination.

column3: Your attack powers are highly damaging and often weaken or hamper the target in some way. You can elude attacks by flying, teleporting, or turn- ing invisible.
column5: You gain your magical power from a pact you forge with a powerful, supernatural force or an unnamed entity.

column3: You are an inspiring commander and a master of battle tactics.
column5: You have become an expert in tactics through endless hours of training and practice, personal determination, and your own sheer physical toughness.

column3: You exert control through magical effects that cover large areas—sometimes hindering foes, sometimes consuming them with fire.
column5: You channel arcane forces through extensive study, hidden knowledge, and intricate preparation. To you, magic is an art form, an expressive and powerful method by which you seek to control the world around you.
